snippet: With competitions offering up to $500,000 in prizes, allegations of cheating are routine in multiple states as some catch fish in advance or artificially boost their weight.
abstract: Big money involved in fishing tournaments inspires many competitors to cheat; in Texas, the only state with a tournament fishing fraud law, seven contestants in the Ladies Kingfish Tournament were charged with a third-degree felony.
lead_paragraph: With competitions offering up to $500,000 in prizes, allegations of cheating are routine in multiple states as some catch fish in advance or artificially boost their weight.

headline.seo: Texas Cases a Sign of Wider Fraud in Fishing Tournaments
headline.main: Texas Fishing Contests Lure Competitors and Fraud
headline.print_headline: Big-Dollar Texas Fishing Tournaments Lure Competitors, Informers and Fraud
